record.alternateTitle1: James Franck Institute, Enrico Fermi Institute, Accelerator Building
record.description: Left to right: Back row: Laird Bell, board of trustees chairman; Thorfin Hogness, chemistry professor, and Monroe E. Spaght, Shell Development. Front row: T. H. Davies, Samuel K. Allison, Admiral Thorwald Solberg, Naval Research, Chancellor Lawrence A. Kimpton, M. J. Kelly, Enrico Fermi, General David M. Schlatter, Air Force Research, Cyril S. Smith, and Robert E. Wilson, Standard Oil.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Caption glued on back. Photographer Bob? Lawrence Kimpton and Robert Wilson have OCLC records, no other subject heading space available.
